articles.description: The Nothing Phone 3, the latest smartphone from Carl Pei's company, is expected to continue the brand's innovative approach to design and marketing. With a possible July 2024 release, the device is anticipated to feature unique design elements and a competiti…
articles.content: In 2020, Carl Pei unveiled his new venture, Nothing, to the world. Within three short years, the company has become one of the fastest-growing smartphone and wearables brands, backed by its innovativ… [+3794 chars]
